name: Survival Squirrel
description:
Survival Squirrel is a 2D platformer where you are a squirrel that lost his nut supply right before winter. Restock your nut supply while evading the winter storm and multiple predators.

Features
  • The squirrel can glide
  • A wintery storm chases you through each level
  • Difficult mechanics that make even simple levels a challenge
Background

I began this project as a final game for one of my University's courses. The goal of this project was to create a fully functioning game. While this is my first attempt at a functioning game, I believe others may have a lot of fun trying to beat the 3 levels with the difficult (probably clunky) platformer mechanics
